text: I Heart Davao (International title: My Sweet Heart) was a 2017 Philippine television drama romance series broadcast by GMA Network. It premiered on the network's Telebabad line up from June 26 to August 18, 2017, replacing Meant to Be. NUTAM (Nationwide Urban Television Audience Measurement) People in Television Homes ratings are provided by AGB Nielsen Philippines. ==Series overview== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center;
